title: Gorgeous Script
content:
Plz help me ID this gorgeous script thx :

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202053211im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/chloe_font_6674.jpg)

 [‹ Round/Straight-Hybrid, Sans "whoo"](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202053211/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39758 "Go to previous forum topic") [Choice ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202053211/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39722 "Go to next forum topic")
author: drduckling

comments.content:
I don’t think so...  
Gosh, I love this font, it has more rythm than the Ariston Extra actually.
It may be [Greyton Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202053211/http:/www.identifont.com/find?similar=Greyton+Script&q=Go) with added stroke?
Anyone who know if there’s a “solid” retail version of Gerhard Schwekendieks script out there?
Thanx a lot Marten ! yeah, is there a solid version somewhere ?
